title: Blume Global ties up with TCS to take supply tech solutions into European, Asian markets - Economic Times
content: Blume Global ties up with TCS to take supply tech solutions into European, Asian markets  Economic Times
description: TCS will help its customers in the hi-tech, transportation, logistics and industrial manufacturing markets leverage Blume Global solutions to drive digital transformation. In turn, Blume Global will promote TCS IT and business services and solutions to its customer base, a press release said.
